author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
Hello there 
I have noticed that the package has been removed from Registries albeit being successfully registered (and update) in July.
Any reason ?

Thats unfortunate, @KristofferC ??

Anyway, can you retrigger the bot to resolve the conflicts.

Hello, 
This has been done but in a different PR (changing version number and changing deps).
It is here now https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/4461

So you can close this !
Sorry for the noise !
Thanks
@+R
